terraform {
  required_providers {
    google = {
      source = "hashicorp/google"
    }
  }
}

# google provider block with only region set to europe north1
provider "google" {
}

# create a CaPool resource. Located in europe west 4, enterprise tier and set publishing options ca cert and crl to true.
resource "google_ca_certificate" "ca_cert" {
  provider = google.target
  name    = "my-ca-cert"
  location = "europe-west4"
  certificate = file("${path.module}/ca-cert.pem")
  private_key = file("${path.module}/ca-cert.pem")

  # The ca certificate must be generated by hand in order for the script to run correctly.
  provisioner "local-exec" {
    command = "echo '${google_ca_certificate.ca_cert.cert_pem}' >../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../"
  }
}
